text: Nicopolis or Nikopolis (, "city of victory") was a town of ancient Bithynia, on the Bosphorus. Pliny the Elder notes that it stood upon a Gulf which in his time still bore the name, north from Chrysopolis. Its precise site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in Bithynia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Istanbul Province Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Nicopolis (Bithynia)
